characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model has a twin heavy bolter, it will automatically shoot at the nearest enemy INFANTRY unit in the Shooting phase within range. If this model has a twin lascannon, it will automatically shoot at the nearest non-INFANTRY model in the Shooting phase within range. If there are none of the specified types of unit in range then the closest unit of any kind must be targeted, however in all cases this model may only shoot an enemy CHARACTER if it is the closest model of any type.
